nodes.text: The Battle of Zehava was a standalone battle that took place shortly after the Young–Elders War involving only the members of the Young. Under the leadership of Mawat, the splinter group called the Scavenger Young decided to start another war. Another group loyal to Nield and Obi-Wan Kenobi tried to stop them and a firefight began. However, it stopped when Qui-Gon appeared with a message from Cerasi who asked them to stop all fighting. It was the last conflict on Melida/Daan.
